name: get_images_from_rosbag
description:
This Action extracts images from a rosbag and can optionally create a video.

By default, all image topics are extracted, but you can optionally specify a list of topics to extract instead.

parameters.name: FORMAT
parameters.description: Output image format. Valid values are 'jpg', 'png'

parameters.name: MANIFEST
parameters.description: Whether to save an image manifest json file

parameters.name: TOPICS
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of topics. If empty, all image topics are extracted

parameters.name: NAMING
parameters.description: Naming schema for the output images. Valid values are 'sequential', 'rosbag_timestamp', 'msg_timestamp'

parameters.name: RESIZE
parameters.description: Desired output resolution in WIDTH,HEIGHT format. For example: 640,360

parameters.name: SAMPLE
parameters.description: Desired sampling rate. For example: 2 to only extract every 2nd image

parameters.name: START_TIME
parameters.description: Start time for the extraction. In seconds since the beginning of the recording

parameters.name: END_TIME
parameters.description: End time for the extraction. In seconds since the beginning of the recording

parameters.name: KEEP_IMAGES
parameters.description: Set True to keep images. Only used when SAVE_VIDEO=True
